divs: Sighting Details10 pm bright lite coming out of south over tree tops first one then another about two minutes later two more from same direction until a total of twelve objects came from south moving north east at slow rate of speed after a half hour of watching the lights move from below clod cover in to cloud cover the last one appeared to drop what appered to be a fire ball i watched it fall behind tree line before i lost site of it i first thought it might be a plane or helacopter but it made no sound i was sitting on my stoop with wife and granddaughter at first siteing i no it was not a aircraft but would like to no if you get any other reports of this siteing i am very sincere about this report i dont know if i beleive in little green men but beleive that other dimenision our involved in all these siteings please contact me at my web site with any imformation or questions thank you for your time alan underwood
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Boardman
There was one other sighting in Boardman on or around April 20th 2012
Summary: 12 brigh cvrafts last one dropped what apperad to be fire ball
